user.title: Vodafone Router Device Polling
user.description: Connect to your Vodafone Station and poll whether your device is online by extracting it from the connected devices API response.

data_description.host: The IP address of your Vodafone Station (usually 192.168.0.1)
data_description.mac_filter: Comma-separated MAC addresses to include only specific devices (leave empty to include all devices). Example: aa:bb:cc:dd:ee:ff, 11:22:33:44:55:66
data_description.enable_binary_sensor: Create binary sensors showing device connectivity status (ON/OFF)
data_description.enable_device_tracker: Create device trackers showing device presence (home/not_home)

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the Vodafone Station. Please check the IP address, username, and password.
